Reviews.Title: Nice but not enough camera
Reviews.Author: teddy bagley
Reviews.Content: I expected a little more than I got. Nikon makes a good camera...But I wanted more then I got. I thought I researched this better

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 9 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Red (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
8 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection
Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - Quality Fiber Cleaning Cloth
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Red (Import) + 8pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit
